hero.subtitle: Digital flat panel detectors for medical, industrial and specialized imaging

advantages.title: Key Advantages
advantages.subtitle: We offer not just products, but comprehensive solutions based on a deep understanding of each industry's needs
advantages.qualityDesc: Full production cycle in Russia. Technopark Beshtau resident. Planned inclusion in the Register of Domestic Products in accordance with Resolution 719 of the Ministry of Industry
advantages.techDesc: Proprietary R&D and patented technologies ensuring superior performance
advantages.supportDesc: International quality certificates and compliance with medical and industrial standards. Detectors feature enhanced IP67 protection
advantages.globalDesc: Technical support and service in all CIS, BRICS, EAEU countries

industries.title: Solutions for Any Imaging Task
industries.subtitle: Our digital flat panel detectors are used in the most demanding areas from medical diagnostics to scientific research
industries.medicalDesc: Digital detectors for radiography, mammography, fluorography, C-arm and dentistry
industries.industrialDesc: Quality control solutions for aerospace, oil & gas, and mechanical engineering industries
industries.scienceDesc: High-sensitivity detectors for scientific research, synchrotron radiation, and microtomography
industries.ctaDesc: Our engineers will develop a custom solution for your tasks. Consultation and technical support - free.

footer.description: Russian leader in manufacturing digital flat panel detectors for medical, industrial and specialized imaging.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to be the first to know about new products and technologies

about.title: World leader in digital detector manufacturing
about.subtitle: Russian leader in creating innovative solutions for medical, industrial and scientific imaging, combining modern engineering technologies with high manufacturing quality.
about.missionText1: To create high-tech imaging solutions that help doctors save lives, engineers ensure safety, and scientists make discoveries.
about.missionText2: We believe that Russian technologies can compete at the global level and we do everything to make our products become standards of quality and reliability.
about.visionText: To become a global technology leader in digital imaging, creating products that exceed international standards and make advanced technologies accessible to all.
about.valuesSubtitle: Principles that define our approach to work and company development
about.innovationDesc: Continuous investment in R&D and development of advanced technologies
about.qualityDesc: International standards and strict control at every stage
about.partnershipDesc: Long-term relationships with clients and suppliers
about.globalityDesc: Operating in markets in over 50 countries worldwide
about.historySubtitle: Key milestones on our path to industry leadership
about.teamText: We are always looking for talented professionals ready to create the technologies of the future with us
